titles.title: A concurrent resolution limiting the amounts available to Members of Congress for official mail costs.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: 2/19/1987--Introduced. Establishes a formula for determining the allocation of official mail costs for Members of Congress for any fiscal year beginning with FY 1987. Directs the Senate Committee on Rules and Administration and the House Committee on House Administration to determine the allocation of each Member. Requires the Committees to prescribe regulations to carry out this resolution. Requires the Committees to publish a quarterly statement on official mail costs.
